attributes.action: Scrap all coursework in GCSE and A-Level Subjects
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Coursework causes much stress among young people, and I beleive that it is less stressful to have an extra question in the exam rather that have a huge geography courswork project (Eg AQA GCSE geography).
Therefore I believe that it should be scrapped completely
